content: this legal case involves two parties referred to as xx and yy the case has been ongoing for 3 years and 1 month the court ruled that one party is responsible for covering the procedural costs but the specific amount was not mentioned the court decision annulled a previous decision regarding the valuation of a car and the sale of an apartment property the court awarded sole ownership of the apartment in tallinn worth 75000 euros to yy and ordered xx to pay compensation of 24009 euros to yy xx must make this payment within 90 days the court also ordered xx to give consent for the change of ownership entry in the register the previous owner entry for yy was deleted and replaced with yy as the sole owner of the apartment property xxs appeal was partially granted while yys appeal was dismissed the joint ownership of real estates and the car was terminated with xx being awarded sole ownership of the car and yy being awarded sole ownership of the apartment in tallinn the costs of the proceedings in the county court and district court will be borne by both parties the parties can appeal to the supreme court within 30 days the case involves the division of joint property between xx and yy including an apartment in tallinn and a car the court determined the value of the joint property and awarded compensation to yy the defendant appealed the decision but the district court partially upheld the plaintiffs appeal and annulled certain parts of the county courts decision the court referred to relevant civil code articles and previous court decisions to support their ruling the district court also determined that the procedural costs should be borne by both parties based on their financial situation
